督促.definition: to supervise and urge completion of a task; to urge on

督察.definition: to supervise; to superintend; inspector; censorship

督建.definition: to supervise and construct; constructed under the supervision of

督撫.definition: governor general 總督|总督[zong3 du1] and inspector general 巡撫|巡抚[xun2 fu3]

督標.definition: army regiment at the disposal of province governor-general

督軍.definition: provincial military governor during the early Republic of China era (1911-1949 AD)

督進去.definition: (slang) (Tw) to stick "it" in; to thrust inside

督龜.definition: (Tw) to doze off (from Taiwanese 盹龜, Tai-lo pr. [tuh-ku])
